CustomProperties.Tooltip: A toggle to hide or show the font Resizer

CustomProperties.Tooltip: Enable or disable visibility of Settings Button (also requires developer true/false)

ScopeVariableInfo.Description: A parameter that defines how much the font should increase or decrease

PropertyScopeRulesKey.Tooltip: A parameter that defines how much the font should increase or decrease

CustomProperties.Name: SetAccessibleTheme

PropertyScopeRulesKey.Name: SetAccessibleTheme_CurrentTheme

ScopeVariableInfo.DefaultRule:
{
        Name:                            "MonoChrome Dark",
        Color1:                          RGBA( 90,  90,  90, 1),
        Color2:                          RGBA(130, 130, 130, 1),
        Color3:                          RGBA(190, 190, 190, 1),
        Color1Text:                      RGBA(245, 245, 245, 1),
        Color2Text:                      RGBA(245, 245, 245, 1),
        Color3Text:                      RGBA( 15,  15,  15, 1),

        defaultTextColor:                RGBA(245, 245, 245, 1),
        
        Font:                            Font.'Segoe UI',
        FontSize:                        14,

        DarkMode:                        true
}
